comments:
When using File -> Open to open a file with the extension ".cquery" an error dialog pops up saying "Invalid Input". The same file can be opened without problems using Buckminster -> "Open a Component Query" or by simply double-clicking it in the navigator.

The following stack-trace can be found in the Eclipse log.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-04-17 12:51:45.921
!MESSAGE Unable to create editor ID org.eclipse.buckminster.ui.editor.QueryEditor: Invalid Input
